_header: Hail Mary and well Thou be
Subjects: Virgin Mary, salutation to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A hymn on the Angelic Salutation — ten lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Heil Marie an wel þe beof loue gunne þu
                    lere…
NLS18721.Last Lines: …Suete maiden marieÞy rewe nou on me
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 7.
